name: UFO - Unidentified Flying Offensive
description:
UFO - Unidentified Flying Offensive is a sidescrolling action space game created for the analogue pocket in a team of 2 during the 2021 RetroJam which netted us in the top 3. The character plays as a UFO running away from the humans back to his home planet.

My role in the creation of this game was the design. This ranges in coming up with the main genre and gameplay loop for the game, to creating the sprites and art in Photoshop whilst my teammate handled the programming.
